code:
sequenceDiagram participant I as Input Image participant PE as Patch Embedding participant ViT as Vision Transformer participant GAT as Graph Attention participant Dec as Decoder participant ZINB as ZINB Heads participant CT as Cell Type Head participant Out as Output I->>PE: 224×224×3 image PE->>PE: Split into 196 patches PE->>ViT: 196×embed_dim tokens loop 6-12 Transformer Blocks ViT->>ViT: Multi-Head Self-Attention ViT->>ViT: Feed-Forward Network end ViT->>GAT: Class token (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) Note over GAT: Spatial Graph Processing GAT->>GAT: Graph Attention Layer 1
Multi-head aggregation GAT->>GAT: Graph Attention Layer 2
Single-head output GAT->>Dec: Spatially-aware features Dec->>Dec: Dense Layer 1 (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream) Dec->>Dec: Dense Layer 2 (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController) par Parallel Heads Dec->>ZINB: μ decoder (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) Dec->>ZINB: θ decoder (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) Dec->>ZINB: π decoder (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) Dec->>CT: Cell Type classifier end ZINB->>Out: Gene expression (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) CT->>Out: Cell type (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) Note over Out: Loss Computation
ZINB Loss + CE Loss
repo_description: Deep learning based method called hist2RNA to predict the expression of genes using digital images of stained tissue samples
